bnpl.title: Boost Your Sales with Easy Zero-Interest Installments
bnpl.customerTitle: Flexible, Fair, and Simple for Your Customers
customerPoints: No credit history needed, or complex KYC.
Instant approval with flexible terms (1-3 months).
Zero extra cost for them without hidden fees.
bnpl.merchantTitle: More Sales, Happier Customers, Zero Hassle for YOU
merchantPoints: Activate installments with a single click – no complex setup.
Offer 1-3 month plans at 0% interest to your customers.
You get paid the full amount instantly, less a clear, upfront service fee of 3%.

steps.title: Generate Payment Link
steps.desc: In seconds, create a unique QR code or URL for any product. No POS hardware needed. We charge 1% fee per payment.

steps.title: Customer Pays Their Way
steps.desc: Your customer scans and chooses: pay instantly with digital MXN/USD, or split the cost with a zero-interest RapiMoni loan (backed by their digital USD).

steps.title: Receive Funds Instantly

howItWorks.title: Get What You Want in 3 Simple Steps

steps.title: Scan the Merchant's QR
steps.desc: At checkout, use your phone’s camera to instantly scan the RapiMoni QR code from the merchant.

steps.title: Pick Your Payment
steps.desc: Your phone, your choice! Pay instantly with digital MXN/USD, or select 'Pay with BNPL Loan' for a 0% interest loan (requires digital USD collateral).

steps.title: Confirm & Enjoy!
